text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.08.Measles"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.08.Measles

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.08.Measles

title: IMMZ.DT.08.Measles

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:00:01+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If the child or patient has not been given MCV1 (at 9 months) and MCV2 (between 15-18 months) vaccination

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT08

action

title: Immunize patient for Measles - No doses

description: Provide measles immunization supplimentary dose - Using the "MCV0 Vaccine immunization - NO Previous" schedule (supplimentary dose zero)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Measles vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles (supplimentary) because no doses

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" > 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles (supplimentary) because no doses

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"HIV Status" = "Positive"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles (supplimentary) because no doses

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" < 9text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles (supplimentary) because no doses

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient is receiving HAART" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles (supplimentary) because no doses

definition: IMMZ.DT.08.Measles.01

action

title: Immunize patient for Measles - No doses

description: Provide measles immunization 1st dose - Using the "MCV1 Vaccine immunization - NO Previous" schedule (2 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Measles vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 9text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"In a setting where there is high transmission of Measles" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pregnancy Status" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.08.Measles.08

action

title: Immunize patient for Measles - 1 Dose

description: Provide measles immunization 1st dose - Using the "MCV2 Vaccine immunization - 1 Previous" schedule (2 doses scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Measles vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 15text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Measles dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pregnancy Status" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles because 1 dose in a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.08.Measles.10

action

title: Immunize patient for Measles supplimentary

description: Provide measles immunization supplimentary dose - Using the "MCV Vaccine immunization" schedule (additional supplimentary dose)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"HIV Status" = "Positive"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles supplimentary dose because HIV positive and started HAART

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Patient is receiving HAART" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles supplimentary dose because HIV positive and started HAART

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Immune reconstitution was achieved" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles supplimentary dose because HIV positive and started HAART

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pregnancy Status" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for measles supplimentary dose because HIV positive and started HAART
